# Number of lines of code in _check: 5
sub _check {
  my $self = shift;
  $self->SUPER::_check(@_);
  $self->Error("Can't raise e to a power") if $self->{lop}->string eq 'e';
}

# Number of lines of code in _eval: 5
sub _eval {
  my $self = shift;
  Value::cmp_Message("Can't raise e to a power") if $_[0] - $e == 0;
  $self->SUPER::_eval(@_);
}
